response.original_title: I Might Go and Throw My Phone Into The Lake, Yeah
response.overview: We started thinking through testosterone in gel and expanded to elements such as tears; warm beer; holy water; and mercury.  With such, we propose a new constellation of technologies through a narration on vulnerability. Tools to destroy and disappear, but also to expand and nourish.  A homage to the symbolic link in a drop of water and a late-night DM; a soaked jacket coming back home and trying to resuscitate a phone in rice.  The film was created through a back-to-back dialogue between "makers". Itâ€™s a research on writing and filming, and simultaneously on affection and subjectivity. It was filmed in Super-8 and 16mm film.
response.title: I Might Go and Throw My Phone Into The Lake, Yeah
